name: LottieFiles Animations
description:
Recently, got to know about the super cool LottieFiles Plugin for Figma! It is so cool!


Plugin Link : https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/809860933081065308/LottieFiles


How you can do it: 

Step 1: Install Lottie Plugin

Step 2: Open the plugin and choose animations from a huge animations library

Step 3: Convert it to a gif

Step 4: Add it to Figma Frame and TaDa!


Super simple and beautiful animations in your designs!


Attaching a Prototype here : https://lnkd.in/er2eaMR
